markets.title: Will Yuichiro Tamaki be the next Prime Minister of Japan?
markets.subtitle: :: DPFP
markets.rules_primary: If the first new person to hold Prime Minister of Japan after Issuance is Yuichiro Tamaki, then the market resolves to Yes.
markets.rules_secondary: The market resolves based on who actually assumes the office of Prime Minister, not who is elected or nominated. Acting or interim appointments count as holding the position if they formally assume the office. The person must be different from whoever held the position at market issuance - if the same person continues in office through the expiration date, all markets resolve to No. For countries where the equivalent position has a different title (e.g., Chancellor in Germany), the specific title will be used. Resolution is based on official announcements from the country's legislature or government, with The New York Times as a secondary source for confirmation.
markets.early_close_condition: This market will close and expire early if a new Prime Minister takes office.
